name: Death Valley (itch) (PETRO_THE_DESTRO)
description: This is the story of a man who lives in a very small town in the Sahara Desert. The city is called Death Valley because of the condition of the population and the continuous conflicts that break out.  War Veteran Muthanna will attempt to reach The City of Health so called because there is a very large oasis. Despite the city’s borders with Death Valley, the terrorists will try in any way possible and by any means to kill any witnesses including Muthanna.....
